SELECT follow_number, tu.*, tupi.user_profile_image_system_name from tbl_follow tf join tbl_user tu on following_number = #{followingNumber} and tf.follow_number = tu.user_number join tbl_user_profile_image tupi on tu.user_number = tupi.user_number
